input_email_body:
Subject: Project Data Vanished Suddenly

Greeting Customer Support Team, I am contacting you to address a problem with my project data that vanished unexpectedly overnight. I am uncertain of the reason behind it and suspect it could be linked to a Cassandra database synchronization issue. Despite attempting to refresh the Docker container, the issue remains unresolved You can reach me at elena.ivanova@support.org.. Your assistance in resolving this situation would be greatly appreciated My name is Jane Smith.. Please inform me if there are any additional steps I should take to diagnose or if you need further details from me.
